title: Pelosi Says NO Payroll Tax Cut | Guests: KT McFarland & Ken Alibek | 5/5/20
description:
We must get rid of the fear overtaking America. Nancy Pelosi would rather give people more government handouts than pass a payroll tax cut. Tom Cruise wants to shoot a movie in space and a five-year-old was pulled over while driving his mom’s car. President Trump, please declare the whole country an economic empowerment zone! Michael Flynn’s former deputy national security adviser, KT McFarland, joins to give her firsthand perspective on Flynn’s case. Former head of the Soviet Union’s biological weapons program and author of “Biohazard,” Ken Alibek, discusses how communist countries like China treat biotech much differently than the US. CNN’s “news” is now Don Lemon wondering why Trump mentions Obama.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
